title: Traffic Bootstrap Campaign - Product Hunt Launch (cats.center)
description:
Launch cats.center on Product Hunt for traffic and community exposure.

## Launch Details
- **Day**: Tuesday (optimal launch day)
- **Time**: 12:01 AM PT
- **Hunter**: Internal or find established hunter

## Required Assets
- Tagline (60 chars max)
- Description (240 chars)
- 4-5 screenshots or images
- Maker intro comment
- First comment strategy

## Expected Results
- Top 10 finish: 500-2,000 visitors
- Top 5 finish: 2,000-5,000 visitors
- Homepage: 5,000-15,000 visitors

## Community Rally
- Notify existing users/supporters
- Post on social when live
- Respond to ALL comments within 1 hour
acceptance_criteria: Product listing created with all assets
Launch scheduled for Tuesday 12:01 AM PT
All Product Hunt comments responded to
testing_plan:
1. Preview listing before launch
2. Test all links in listing
3. Monitor real-time traffic during launch
4. Track signups during 24-hour launch window
